actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To prohibit the U.S. Postal Service from closing any post office which serves any rural area or any small community or town.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Postal Service from closing or suspending the operation of any post office which provides postal services to any rural area or small town, unless otherwise specifically provided by law.

titles.title: To prohibit the U.S. Postal Service from closing any post office which serves any rural area or any small community or town.
